DOC.brief_title: Comparative Clinical Trial Efficacy Safety BCD-055 Remicade® Combination With Methotrexate Patients With Active Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Active rheumatoid arthritis accord criterion American College Rheumatologists ( 2010 ) , diagnose least 6 month prior screen . Active rheumatoid arthritis screen despite therapy methotrexate 3 last month . Use methotrexate stable dose least 4 week screen ( 1025 mg per week ) . History ineffective treatment basic antiinflammatory drug ( include methotrexate ) . Previous therapy rheumatoid arthritis monoclonal antibody ( include antitumor necrosis factor drug ) Felty 's syndrome Functional status class IV accord ACR classification ( 1991 ) Low activity rheumatoid arthritis ( DAS28CRP ( 4 ) index le 3.2 ) Patient need corticosteroid dose 10 mg ( recalculate prednisolone ) signing informed consent . Patients need equal less 10 mg prednisolone dose stable last 4 week prior infliximab treatment Prior use diseasemodifying antirheumatic drug include methotrexate , sulfasalazin , chloroquine hydroxychloroquine 4 week randomization . Prior use alkylating agent 12 month prior sign inform consent . Intraarticular use corticosteroid 4 week randomization . Prior use live attenuate vaccine 8 week sign informed consent . Diagnosis tuberculosis . Body mass 130 kg .
